summary: Possible docker container escapte and privilege escalation, this issue is unconfirmed, and no specific details are available.
details: The Twitter/GitHub user int0x80 reports a docker container related escape and privilege escalation. The version of docker affected is not known, and details have not been released at this time. The user known as int0x80 has previously given anti-forensics talks at DefCon 24 and Derbycon 2016.
